did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Independent Order of Good Templars. Yatesville Union Lodge No. 94 (Yatesville, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: One volume containing meeting minutes and a list of members. Miscellaneous items.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Lodge was formed on September 29, 1880. A Lodge hall was completed on May 7, 1881.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: One volume containing meeting minutes (1880-1883) and a list of members (1882). Miscellaneous items including a printed constitution and by-laws for the Independent Order of Good Templars, State of New York, a membership certificate, a circular on Juvenile Templars and a Good Templars Mutual Benefit Association announcement.

controlaccess.head: Places:
controlaccess.geogname: Yates County (N.Y.) -- Social life and customs.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Independent Order of Good Templars, Yatesville Union Lodge No. 94 Records. #6146. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
